page.title: 05A Day In My Life-Helen
page.content: I wake up in the morning.Then I start to play.At 8.00a.m. I get dressed and then I go down stairs and have my break_fast and watch T.V. then I would go back up stairs.Then have a wash and clean teeth.And then I would go down stairs.Go and kiss Mum and my little sister Olivia and go to the bus stop and wait for Bob the bus driver. And when the bus comes.We all get on it.I sit by the front or in the front.After ten minutes we all get off the bus and go in to{school} and play for a bit.Then we do some work for an hour.Then we go out to play for 15 minutes.I play on the little rope.Then we go to drama on Wednesday.Then we have some lunch.Then we go out to play.Then we go swimming.
